name: Astral (itch) (EK Game)
description:
The game was created based on the movie Astral. A guy named Josh has the ability to move into the astral world and this ability was passed on to his son. But one day when his son wandered through the astral world, he got lost and Josh must find his son and save him.

The game is expected to game rap who is over 18 because this game is horrifying.

You can play with a gamepad. We hope you enjoy our game. If you have any questions or wishes comments are always open for you.
